name: Floating Related Posts
author: Fransoft

sections.description:
Floating Related Posts adds a banner with a cool list of related content.

You can place Floating Related Posts at the top or bottom of your website and easily customize it with the help of the live preview. You can change background color, text color, buttons style, font size, and so on.

FEATURES

  • Boost your metrics: up to 20% increase of page views
  • Related by tags, categories or both
  • Filter by time range
  • Fully customizable: modify size, position, colors and style
  • Scroll trigger
  • Compatible with Google Analytics
  • Live preview: what you see is what you get
  • Easy translatable to your language: includes POT template

short_description: Increase your page views and bounce rate with Floating Related Posts
